Name: Glaive
About the game: Battle monsters of the darkness with a kinetic blade! Intense combat and blade throwing action in adrenaline inducing VR! Skirmish through progressive levels of challenge and adversity to find ultimate victory or your fatal demise. Defeat the darkness! Wield the Glaive! Features: Challenging fast-action gameplay that's simple and fun Seven levels of increasing difficulty plus hard mode for seven additional levels of hard mode difficulty Continue options to start the action where you left off HTC Vive and only one Vive controller required Standing only and room-scale compatible
